Alfie Potter

Camberwell Graphics Virtual Tour

This is a virtual tour of the Graphic Design floor at Camberwell College of Arts. It is intended for students applying to the course who are unable to attend the in-person tour. Click on the arrows to navigate around the building, and click the �i� icons for more information about the equipment available as part of the course. The virtual tour can be accessed in virtual reality, as well as via browser on any device, at: https://camberwellgraphicsvirtualtour.co.uk/
